abstract: A sense of relief among businesses is tempered by the anticipation of political battles to come. | Sophisticated investors increasingly are wary of big banks. | Al Jazeera is gaining a larger foothold in the United States with a deal for Current TV. | The Avis Budget Group’s deal for Zipcar is a new direction for the company.
snippet: A sense of relief among businesses is tempered by the anticipation of political battles to come. | Sophisticated investors increasingly are wary of big banks. | Al Jazeera is gaining a larger foothold in the United States with a deal for Current T...
lead_paragraph: One fiscal showdown drew to a close this week, as the president signed a bill to raise taxes on the wealthiest Americans. But the sense of relief among businesses was tempered by the anticipation of political battles to come. Next month, Congress is set to negotiate over raising the debt ceiling.

headline.main: Bracing for the Next Political Standoff
